nodes.text: Valkyrie 2929 was a Nu-class attack shuttle under the command of Jedi Generals Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker. The ship was piloted by clone trooper pilot Hawk and was used to transport Kenobi, Skywalker, Ahsoka Tano, and Captain Rex to a location near the Onderon rebels' camp shortly before the Battle of Onderon began.
